Token.Abstract: The AnylineController Delegate methods must be implemented to get results of the Anyline processing. All delegate callbacks are garanteed to be executed in the Main Thread.
Tells the delegate that the processing has successfully finished and gives the delegate the final output object.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The result object of the processing. The result is specified with the RETURN statement in the .alc file.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the processing has not completed successfully. Possible reason would be for example that the display or paper frame could not be found.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: A NSError object with ALErrorDomain and an appropriate status.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate a specified intermediate result. Which intermediate results are reported can be specified in the .alc command file with the REPORT function.

Parameter.Name: variableName
Parameter.Abstract: The variable name in the .alc file which should be reported.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The value of the reported variable.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that there was a parsing error.
